scripts.build: @echo on && echo [1/5] Starting build process && (if exist docs (echo [2/5] Removing existing docs directory && rmdir /s /q docs || echo [2/5] Failed to remove docs directory, continuing build...) else (echo [2/5] No existing docs directory to remove)) && echo [3/5] Running Vite build... && pnpm build:client && (echo [4/5] Vite build completed successfully && echo [5/5] Copying necessary files... && copy package.json docs && type nul > docs/build.flag && echo Build completed successfully! docs directory created. && exit 0) || (echo ERROR: Build failed during Vite build step! Check the error messages above for details. && exit 1)
scripts.preview: if not exist docs (echo Error: docs directory not found! Please run 'pnpm build' first. && exit 1) else (echo Starting preview server... && vite preview --port 8080 --outDir docs)
scripts.fix-npm-warnings: npm config delete verify-deps-before-run && npm config delete _jsr-registry
